subCategories.name: Gelish Harmony
subCategories.description: Gel polish dries instantly and maintains a high gloss finish which last for 2 weeks or more.

treatments.name: Gelish Application
treatments.description: Gelish Harmony nails last 2-4 weeks.

treatments.name: Gelish remove and new
treatments.description: File, cuticle tidy, removal of existing Gelish with re-application.

treatments.name: Gelish remove only
treatments.description: File, cuticle tidy, removal of Gelish followed by application of nail strengthener.

treatments.name: Manicure with Gelish
treatments.description: File, cuticle tidy, scrub, massage followed by application of Gelish.

treatments.name: Manicure with Gelish remove and new
treatments.description: File, cuticle tidy, scrub, massage, removal of existing Gelish with re-application.

treatments.name: Pedicure with Gelish
treatments.description: File, cuticle tidy, foot soak, scrub, massage followed by application of Gelish.

treatments.name: Pedicuire remove and new
treatments.description: File, cuticle tidy, foot soak, scrub, massage, removal of existing Gelish with re-application.

subCategories.name: Polygel
subCategories.description: Polygel is 23% lighter than acrylics, the most natural feeling for enhancements with lots of flexibility whilst still having lots of strength. It is feather-light and odourless. Not an acrylic, not a hard gel! Gelish Polygel combines the best of both in an all-in-one system.

treatments.name: Polygel nail extensions
treatments.description: File, cuticle tidy, tips applied, Polygel finished with Gelish

treatments.name: Polygel overlays
treatments.description: File, cuticle tidy, application of Polygel to natural nails finished with Gelish

treatments.name: Infills
treatments.description: File, cuticle tidy, infilled with Polygel

treatments.name: Polygel removal only
treatments.description: File, cuticle tidy, removal of Polygel finished with nail strengthener

treatments.name: Polygel removal with manicure
treatments.description: File, cuticle tidy, hand soak, scrub, massage finished with nail strengthner

treatments.name: Manicure with strengthener
treatments.description: File, cuticle soak, hand scrub, hand massge followed by strenghtener.

treatments.name: Pedicure with strengthener
treatments.description: File, cuticle soak, foot soak, foot scrub, foot massage followed by strengtherner.

treatments.name: Luxury Manicure
treatments.description: Enjoy whilst the warm wax is applied to your hands, which leaves your hands feeling soothed and hydrated whilst improving circulation and dry skin. File, cuticle tidy, hand and arm exfoliation, mask and warm wax finished with a relaxing hand and arm massage.

treatments.name: Luxury Pedicure
treatments.description: Enjoy whilst the warm wax is applied to your feet, which leaves your feet feeling soothed and hydrated whilst improving circulation and dry skin. File, cuticle tidy, exfoliation, mask and warm wax finished with a relaxing foot massage.

treatments.name: Swedish back massage
treatments.description: Designed to focus on tension areas to release aches and pains and aid relaxation.

treatments.name: Full body massage
treatments.description: Whole body experience to help soothe tired aching muscles and leave you feeling relaxed and refreshed.

treatments.name: Relexology
treatments.description: A wonderful treatment to help relax the whole body, reduce stress and tension whilst reblancing all of the body systems.

treatments.name: Indian Head Massage
treatments.description: This head massage is stimulating to the neck, shoulders and head. Relieving fatigue, headaches, sinusitis with having a sense of deep calming relaxtion.

treatments.name: Hopi ear candles
treatments.description: Relaxing treatment designed for people who suffer from migraines, headaches, sinusitits, glue ear tinnitus and for anyone who would like a general sense of relaxation.

treatments.name: Eyelash Tint
treatments.description: Patch test required at least 24 hours prior to treatment. Treatment lasts 4-6 weeks.

treatments.name: Eyebrow Tint
treatments.description: Patch test required at least 24 hours prior to treatment. Treatment lasts 4 weeks.

treatments.name: Eyelash & Eyebrow Tint
treatments.description: Patch test required at least 24 hours prior to treatment. Treatment lasts 4-6 weeks.
